pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, July 14, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Percé, Quebec

Private meetings.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of National Revenue Diane Lebouthillier, will be joined virtually by Les Îles-de-la-Madeleine Mayor Jonathan Lapierre to participate in a virtual roundtable discussion with community stakeholders from the Îles-de-la-Madeleine.

L’hôtel Le Manoir de Percé
212, route 132 Ouest
Percé, Quebec                          

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • The remarks portion of the event will be streamed via the following link: https://zoom.us/j/93247937345?pwd=UXd3RzBiUWZNK2Vhdm05R0c5VlJEUT09
  • Meeting ID: 932 4793 7345
  • Passcode: 507749

Gaspé, Quebec

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry François-Philippe Champagne, Minister of National Revenue Diane Lebouthillier, and Quebec Minister of Energy and Natural Resources, Jonatan Julien, will tour the LM Wind Power Plant and make an announcement. A media availability will follow.                          

LM Wind Power Canada Inc.
7, rue des Cerisiers
Gaspé, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the announcement.
  • Open coverage
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7518
    Toll-free: 1-866-805-7923
    Pass code: 6822783#
